cause.description:
A group against pollution. But if you are in this group, just remember next time you see trash on the ground or a factory over polutting, try to do something.
1. Remeber to pick up trash on ground once in a while.
2. Remeber to recycle.
3. Try to help remind you family and friends.
cause.mission: Keep the earth and us heatly.
cause.name: Stop Pollution!
